archimate:BusinessProcess.name: C. Information systems architeture
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Develop the Target Information Systems (Data and Applicaiton) Architecture, describing how the enterprie's Information Systems Architecture will enable the Business Architecture and the Architecture vision, in a way that...
Data architecture key considerations * Data management - location of Master data - adption of related data standards - how data is utilied by business services/functions/processes - how created, stored, transported, reported - data exchange * Data migration * Data governance - structure: organizational bodies ot mange data apsects - management system: Manage enterprise ddata entitiees througout theere lifcylce - Poeple : what data-realtated skills and roles are needed for the transformation
Application architecture key considerations * The architecture team will neded to consider what relevant Application Architechtur eresources are avialabel - generic business models (e.g. telecommuniations, health care, finance, etc.) - application models relevant to common high-level business functions, such as electronic commerce, supply chain management, etc. * The Open Group has a Reference Model for Integrated Information Infrastructure * Resources are avaialbele in the Architecture Repoitory
